DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Needle Size Pain Perception With Botulinum Toxin A Injections
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects screen , assess , randomize injected onabotulinum toxin A use 30-gauge needle one side face inject use 32-gauge needle side first clinic visit . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . In good health 2 . Is female 3 . Is 2570 year age 4 . Has moderate dynamic forehead/glabellar wrinkle 5 . Has willingness ability understand provide inform consent communicate study staff 1 . Younger 25 old 70 year age 2 . Pregnant lactate 3 . Is male 4 . Has receive follow treatment forehead glabellar region : 1. botulinum toxin injection past 6 month 2. ablative laser procedure past 6 month 3. radiofrequency device treatment past 6 month 4. ultrasound device treatment past 6 month 5. medium deep chemical peel past 6 month 6. temporary soft tissue augmentation material area treat past year 7. semipermanent soft tissue augmentation material area treat past 2 year 8. permanent soft tissue augmentation material area treat 5 . Has active infection forehead glabellar region ( exclude mild acne ) 6 . Is allergic cow'smilk protein 7 . Is allergic albumin 8 . Taking aminoglycoside 9 . Is currently use anticoagulation therapy 10 . Has history bleed disorder 11 . Has mental illness 12 . Unable understand protocol give inform consent
